pageContext.claim: “In just three years, we removed over half a million criminal aliens, including those charged or convicted of more than 145,000 assaults, 40,000 sex crimes, and 6,000 murders, 6,000 murders.”
pageContext.analysis: These figures involve a mix of serious and nonviolent offenses such as immigration violations. Notice how Trump switches quickly from the total for arrests (1 million) to the total for charges and convictions. These numbers for arrests and charges are apples and oranges. By switching from one to the other, Trump confuses the issue and exaggerates the criminality. In many cases, the people arrested face multiple counts, and not all charges result in convictions.
